name: part_007
file: tmp_【#⁠湊あくあ5周年LIVE】Dreamy day 【湊あくあ⧸ホロライブ】 [c9VW0E2Unl4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua, Houshou Marine, and Shiranui Flare perform 'Ichiban no Takaramono ~Yui final ver.~' on stage.
A transition scene where Minato Aqua expresses her gratitude to the employees of Akukin Construction and her fans worldwide through a voice-over and on-screen text.
Usada Pekora appears on stage and has a heartwarming conversation with Minato Aqua before their duet.
Minato Aqua and Usada Pekora perform 'Colorful' together on stage.

subtitles.original: いくべ
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: なぜかそれが今
subtitles.english: For some reason, right now,

subtitles.original: 一番の宝物
subtitles.english: it's my most precious treasure.

subtitles.original: あくたんも、社員だったみんな、
subtitles.english: Akutan, and everyone who was an employee,

subtitles.original: あくきん建設を楽しんでくれた、世界中の人へ。
subtitles.english: to all the people worldwide who enjoyed Akukin Construction.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: あくあ先輩、待ちくたびれたぺこよ。
subtitles.english: Aqua-senpai, I've been waiting for ages-peko.

subtitles.original: ぺこらちゃん。
subtitles.english: Pekora-chan.

subtitles.original: ごめん、待っててくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Sorry. Thank you for waiting for me.

subtitles.original: いつもモノクロだった瞳の奥の",
subtitles.english: Deep in my eyes that were always monochrome,

subtitles.original: 景色捨てたら夢見つけた
subtitles.english: I found a dream once I cast the scenery away.

subtitles.original: 何もない世界で創る絆は
subtitles.english: The bonds we create in a world with nothing

subtitles.original: 強い意志与えた
subtitles.english: gave me a strong will.

subtitles.original: 裏返した日常でもまた
subtitles.english: Even in an upended daily life, once again,

subtitles.original: 走って行く先に君はいた
subtitles.english: you were there at the end of where I ran.

subtitles.original: 触れた心は輝いた
subtitles.english: The heart I touched sparkled.

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな色になって羽ばたくよ希望のせて
subtitles.english: Turning into vivid colors, I'll spread my wings, carrying hope.

subtitles.original: 無限に広がる空の下詰まった
subtitles.english: Under the infinitely spreading sky, the

subtitles.original: 願い守り進めばまた
subtitles.english: wishes I've gathered, if I protect them and move on,

subtitles.original: まだ誰も知らない明日へと
subtitles.english: towards a tomorrow that no one knows yet.

subtitles.original: 引き寄せられるように覗いた瞬間
subtitles.english: The moment I peeked in as if being drawn,

subtitles.original: 光の糸は君包んだ
subtitles.english: a thread of light wrapped around you.

subtitles.original: 細く千切れそうな絡まった運命
subtitles.english: An entangled fate that seems thin and about to break,

subtitles.original: きっとまだ変われる
subtitles.english: I'm sure it can still change.

subtitles.original: 間違えても信じた道は
subtitles.english: Even if I make a mistake, the path I believed in

subtitles.original: 新しい景色を照らすだろう
subtitles.english: will likely illuminate a new scenery.

subtitles.original: 巡る時の中笑って
subtitles.english: Laughing as time goes around,

subtitles.original: 様々な想い持って始めようまた一から
subtitles.english: with various feelings, let's start again from scratch.

subtitles.original: 辿り着いた儚き奇跡壊れないように
subtitles.english: So that the fleeting miracle I reached doesn't break,

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばし繋げばほら
subtitles.english: look, if I reach out my hand and connect,

subtitles.original: 君はそばでいつまでも
subtitles.english: you'll be by my side forever.

subtitles.original: まだ透明な私たちはどんな色にでも
subtitles.english: We, who are still transparent, can turn into any color.
